text: Slayed? is a 1972 rock album by English band Slade. It was the band's third studio album, released as the first since their rise to fame. A successful album, it went to number one in the UK. The album featured the two singles "Mama Weer All Crazee Now" and "Gudbuy T'Jane". ==Track listing== ==Other websites== * Slayed? on AllMusic * Slayed? at Discogs.com Category:1972 albums Category:Slade albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Glam rock albums
title: Slayed?
